title: Delivery Inputs Request
description: Inputs required to create a delivery or to receive a quote for a delivery.

pickup_ready_dt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when pickup can begin.

pickup_deadline_dt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp after which pickup is no longer valid.

dropoff_ready_dt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when dropoff can begin.

dropoff_deadline_dt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp after which dropoff is no longer valid.

external_store_id.description: Optional store identifier for routing or pricing.

external_id.description: Optional external identifier for idempotency or correlation.
